It's too short (not cropped) and for those of us that carry our weight in our waist and lower belly, this is not flattering at all. I was hoping for a longer fit. I ordered the large for this reason. I want to try the XL but then I might come into the problem of the sleeves being TOO long and don't even know if the size up adds length to the body of the sweater to begin with.

This is a cute sweater and has a good weight to it. I've worn it for maybe 5 hours at an office job and it has snagged/pulled 3 times. It's also already starting to pill under the arms. I guess I'll just have to wear this in a bubble. The bottom has stretched out a bit, but the balloon sleeve has maintained it's shape. I got a 2xl and it fits fine. 评论概述: Sweater gave me a horrible rash
评论详情: *Update* - The company reached out to me and was extremely helpful. Customer service is 5 stars! Just be very careful if your skin is sensitive to different fabrics. I’ve never had any issues until this sweater.  Please save yourself the hassle and don’t buy this sweater. I washed it, then wore it and it gave me a rash. At first I thought it was something else that caused the rash so I wore it a second time and proceeded to get a rash in the same spot only worse on the second wear (probably due to wearing it all day). I’m so bummed because this sweater is so cute, but not at all worth the rashes it has given me.
